bike.description: FACT 10m carbon main triangle, FACT IS-X construction, M5 rear triangle, tapered HT, Mag shock extension, full cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable ISCG mounts, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel

components.description: Fox RP23-S with Boost Valve, reb and separate climbing setting and custom 3-position low-speed comp adj., 8.5x2.125"
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post, 3 position, 125mm adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head
36.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, for carbon frame
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
